VoiceList.Entry: “Sorry it's out of order.”
Tifa “Cloud I really had fun tonight.”
Cloud “By the way, what did you want to say a minute ago?”
Tifa “N,nothing!”
Tifa “Nothing…”
Cloud “?”
Tifa “Oh,look at the time. We should be getting back.”
Aeris “I had fun tonight. Let's do it again.”
Aeris “Don't you like being with me?” No,I don't That's not it
Aeris “Oh,don't tease me like that!”
Aeris “I'm glad.”
“Next time we come, let's take our time and go on more rides.”
Aeris “Oh,look at the time. We'd better get going.”
Barret “Oh man I'm beat. Let's head back.”
Yuffie “I should sleep really well tonight.”
Yuffie “Thanks… for coming with me.”
Cloud “Yeah.”
Yuffie “You wanna go back, Cloud?”
Cloud “Who should I ride with?” Party2 Party3
“Welcome. This attraction is 3 GP.
“Shall you be riding this evening?” Yes,I shall No,I shan't
“Um,I'm very sorry,but you do not have enough GP.”
“Would this be your first time riding with us?” Yes,it would No,it would not
“You will be able to see all of Gold Saucer park on this ride.
“Is that right?”
“This attraction can only accommodate 2 passengers,so one of you please wait over there.”
“Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.”
Aeris “Two,please.”
Tifa “Two,please.”
Yuffie “Two.”
Barret “Hey! You gotta be kiddin'! Just us two? …ok,that's cool,I guess…”
Barret “Yo. Two.”
“Here you are,two tickets.”
Aeris “We don't have time for this! We've got to go after Cait Sith.”
Tifa “There's no time for this. Let's hurry after Cait Sith!”
Yuffie “Should we be doing this? I thought we were after Cait Sith?”
Barret “The hell you doin'!? We gotta go after Cait Sith!”
